attributes.action: force g4s to pay for the training of applicants before the tax payer pays court fees
attributes.additional_details: Force G4S to pay for the sia training they promised to people who applied. I thought of this idea as I went to legal aid to speak to a solicitor asking for advice to see if I had a claim I was told I may be able to sue in county court which being unemployed would cost the tax payer and if I done this how many thousands of other people would do the same I think the tax payer pays enough so rather than thousands of let down people taking g4s to court on tax payers money I think g4s should just provide us with the training we all should of got

rejection.details: The e-petitions process is designed to allow individuals to raise issues about Government policy. The matter that you have raised is matter for the company concerned.
